title: Did Sunak Do Enough? (with Gareth Davies, Richard Thomson and Christine Jardine MP)
itunes:title: Did Sunak Do Enough? (with Gareth Davies, Richard Thomson and Christine Jardine MP)
description:
Conservative Gareth Davies says the Chancellor got the balance right in the Spring Statement against a very difficult backdrop. The MP for Grantham and Stamford tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker that Rishi Sunak is a proven, innovative chancellor.

But the SNP's Richard Thomson says the statement offers little to households struggling with their bills. Liberal Democrats Treasury spokesperson Christine Jardine adds that the Sunak should have implemented a windfall tax on oil and gas companies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
